definitions.definition: An affix inserted inside a root , such as -ma- in English edumacation .
A prefix that is not at the beginning of a word, such as the con- of reconcile , or a suffix that is not at the end of a word, such as the -al of nationality .
labels: some authors when describing agglutinative languages
definitions.label_groups: some authors when describing agglutinative languages , otherwise dated

definitions.definition: A prefix that always occurs in the position immediately before the verb root, and which may in turn be preceded by other prefixes.

main_definition: An affix inserted inside a root , such as -ma- in English edumacation .
secondary_definitions: ( some authors when describing agglutinative languages , otherwise dated ) A prefix that is not at the beginning of a word, such as the con- of reconcile , or a suffix that is not at the end of a word, such as the -al of nationality .
( Bantu linguistics , dated ) A prefix that always occurs in the position immediately before the verb root, and which may in turn be preceded by other prefixes.
